hero.title: Phantom vs Maybach
hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Luxury Comparison: British Elegance meets German Engineering

phantom.tagline: The pinnacle of British luxury and craftsmanship

maybach.tagline: German engineering excellence and modern luxury

comparison.title: Detailed Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Every detail matters in the world of ultra-luxury

differences.title: Key Differences
differences.subtitle: Understanding what sets these legends apart

heritage.title: Heritage & Legacy
heritage.description: Rolls-Royce brings over a century of royal patronage and bespoke luxury, while Maybach represents the revival of German ultra-luxury with modern innovation.

technology.title: Technology Integration
technology.description: Maybach leads with cutting-edge tech like MBUX and augmented reality navigation, while Phantom focuses on timeless elegance with carefully integrated modern conveniences.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship Philosophy
craftsmanship.description: Phantom features hand-assembled components and unlimited customization, while Maybach combines precision engineering with luxurious automation.

performance.title: Performance Approach
performance.description: Phantom prioritizes effortless waftability and supreme comfort, while Maybach offers a more dynamic drive with sport modes and faster acceleration.

interior.title: Interior Experience
interior.description: Phantom's cabin is a sanctuary of traditional luxury with the iconic Starlight headliner, while Maybach offers a high-tech lounge with massage seats and ambient lighting.

value.title: Value Proposition
value.description: Phantom commands a premium for exclusivity and heritage, while Maybach offers comparable luxury with better value and lower running costs.

verdict.title: Our Verdict
verdict.subtitle: Both are exceptional, but which one suits you?

choose_phantom.title: Choose the Phantom if you value:
choose_phantom.reason3: The quietest and most comfortable ride

choose_maybach.title: Choose the Maybach if you prefer:

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Which car is more prestigious for weddings in Dubai?
faq.a1: The Rolls-Royce Phantom is traditionally considered more prestigious for weddings due to its iconic status and royal heritage. However, the Maybach is increasingly popular among younger couples who appreciate modern luxury.
faq.a2: The Mercedes-Maybach excels in technology with its MBUX system, augmented reality navigation, and advanced driver assistance. The Phantom focuses on seamlessly integrated technology that doesn't compromise its classic luxury feel.
faq.a3: Both excel in rear comfort. The Phantom offers more legroom and the famous 'Magic Carpet Ride,' while the Maybach provides executive seats with massage functions and entertainment screens.
faq.q4: Which is better for business meetings?
faq.a4: The Phantom makes a stronger traditional business statement with its presence and heritage. The Maybach appeals to tech-savvy executives with its connectivity features and modern amenities.
faq.q5: Can I switch between both during my rental period?
faq.a5: Yes! We offer flexible rental packages that allow you to experience both vehicles. Many clients rent the Phantom for formal events and the Maybach for city touring.

cta.title: Experience Luxury Your Way
cta.subtitle: Both legends are available for immediate rental in Dubai

hero.subtitle: Why Rolls-Royce Rental Delivers an Unmatched Luxury Experience

rolls-royce.title: The Epitome of Bespoke Luxury
points: Handcrafted excellence with unlimited customization
The most prestigious automotive brand in the world
Unmatched ride quality with Magic Carpet Ride
Symbol of ultimate success and achievement
rolls-royce.summary: Rolls-Royce stands alone at the pinnacle of automotive luxury.

mercedes.title: Pioneering Luxury Innovation
points: Advanced technology integrated with refined luxury
Broader model range from executive to ultra-luxury
Industry-leading safety and innovation features
Perfect balance of performance and comfort
mercedes.summary: Mercedes-Benz combines German engineering with modern luxury.

rolls-royce.title: Artisanal Craftsmanship
points: Hand-stitched leather from exclusive European tanneries
Starlight headliner with up to 1,600 fiber optic lights
Bespoke wood veneers matched from single trees
Gallery feature transforming dashboard into art space
rolls-royce.summary: Every Rolls-Royce interior is a bespoke masterpiece.

mercedes.title: Modern Sophisticated Luxury
points: MBUX interior assistant with gesture control
Energizing comfort with massage and aromatherapy
Burmester 4D surround sound systems
Executive rear seat package with reclining seats
mercedes.summary: Mercedes-Benz delivers cutting-edge luxury with advanced technology.

rolls-royce.title: Effortless Waftability
points: Twin-turbo V12 engines with seamless power delivery
Focus on silence and smoothness over speed
Satellite Aided Transmission for predictive gear changes
Air suspension with road-scanning technology

mercedes.title: Dynamic Performance Excellence
points: AMG variants with exceptional performance capabilities
EQ Boost mild hybrid technology for efficiency
4MATIC all-wheel drive for superior traction
Multiple driving modes from comfort to sport+

rolls-royce.title: Discreet Innovation
points: Technology seamlessly integrated behind classic design
Bespoke audio system individually tuned to each car
Night vision with wildlife and pedestrian warning
Spirit of Ecstasy retracts automatically for security

mercedes.title: Technological Leadership
points: MBUX Hyperscreen with AI-powered personalization
Level 3 autonomous driving capabilities
Augmented reality navigation display
Over-the-air updates for continuous improvement

rolls-royce.title: 120 Years of Perfection
points: Founded in 1904 with commitment to excellence
Provider to royalty and world leaders
Spirit of Ecstasy - most iconic automotive symbol
Each car still hand-built in Goodwood, England
rolls-royce.summary: Rolls-Royce represents an unbroken tradition of excellence.

mercedes.title: Inventor of the Automobile
points: Karl Benz created the first automobile in 1886
Pioneered countless automotive innovations
Three-pointed star symbolizes universal motorization
Consistent Formula 1 dominance showcasing excellence
mercedes.summary: Mercedes-Benz invented the automobile and continues to shape its future.

rolls-royce.title: Ultimate Rental Experience
points: Professional chauffeur included with every rental
Daily rates from AED 3,500 with all-inclusive service
Complimentary fuel, insurance, and 24/7 concierge
Perfect for weddings, corporate events, and VIP occasions
rolls-royce.summary: Rolls-Royce rental offers an unmatched luxury experience with complete white-glove service.

mercedes.title: Standard Luxury Rental
points: Self-drive options from AED 1,200 per day
Basic insurance coverage included
Limited chauffeur availability
Suitable for business meetings and airport transfers
mercedes.summary: Mercedes rental provides good value but lacks the exclusive services of Rolls-Royce.

chauffeur.title: Professional Chauffeur
chauffeur.desc: Every Rolls-Royce rental includes a trained professional chauffeur. Mercedes rentals often charge extra.

experience.title: VIP Experience
experience.desc: Red carpet service, airport meet & greet, and personalized attention that Mercedes rentals cannot match.

prestige.title: Ultimate Prestige
prestige.desc: Arrive in a Rolls-Royce and make an unforgettable impression. Mercedes is common, Rolls-Royce is extraordinary.
